=====
PySDN
=====


.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/pysdn.svg
        :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/pysdn

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/travis/crossbario/pysdn.svg
        :target: https://travis-ci.org/crossbario/pysdn

.. image:: https://readthedocs.org/projects/pysdn/badge/?version=latest
        :target: https://pysdn.readthedocs.io/en/latest/?badge=latest
        :alt: Documentation Status




Python / CFFI-based glue library to access Linux XDP/eBPF, bpfilter, tc and Facebook Katran


* Free software: MIT license
* Documentation: https://pysdn.readthedocs.io.
